医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新书概述了改善学习的简单的增强记忆技巧一本新书解释了记忆如何运作的奥秘，这本书建议任何人都可以增强记忆力，而丢失钥匙是正常的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/New-book-outlines-simple-recollection-boosting-techniques-to-improve-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/New-book-outlines-simple-recollection-boosting-techniques-to-improve-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28641643-8d7c-448e-aaa9-cc95201a3ce9 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 08:09:51 -0400 New book outlines simple recollection-boosting techniques to improve learning
研究揭示阿片类药物使用障碍患者的姑息治疗存在差异根据《CMAJ》（加拿大医学杂志）发表的新研究，与没有阿片类药物使用障碍的人相比，患有阿片类药物使用障碍的人在诊所和家中接受姑息治疗的可能性较小，并且因阿片类药物使用以外的原因而死亡的年龄较小。协会期刊）https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj.231419。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Study-reveals-disparities-in-palliative-care-for-people-with-opioid-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Study-reveals-disparities-in-palliative-care-for-people-with-opioid-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a937ca79-a693-4690-a6dc-14b49885c220 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 07:59:33 -0400 Study reveals disparities in palliative care for people with opioid use disorder
义翘神州完成收购SignalChem Biotech，加强全球影响力并扩大产品组合https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Sino-Biological-finalizes-the-acquisition-of-SignalChem-Biotech-strengthening-global-presence-and-expanding-product-portfolio.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Sino-Biological-finalizes-the-acquisition-of-SignalChem-Biotech-strengthening-global-presence-and-expanding-product-portfolio.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de480d0e-3ddc-4c54-b22a-e9071d86598d Mon, 29 Apr 2024 07:56:00 -0400 Sino Biological finalizes the acquisition of SignalChem Biotech, strengthening global presence and expanding product portfolio
SCA4基因突破：揭示毁灭性神经系统疾病的原因有些家庭称之为信仰的考验。其他人只是称之为诅咒。脊髓小脑共济失调 4 (SCA4) 是一种进行性神经系统疾病，是一种罕见疾病，但它对患者及其家人的影响可能很严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/SCA4-genic-breakthrough-Unveiling-the-cause-of-a-devastating-neurological-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/SCA4-genic-breakthrough-Unveiling-the-cause-of-a-devastating-neurological-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d072f786-58ba-499a-aa75-3695d55c0726 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 07:47:54 -0400 SCA4 genetic breakthrough: Unveiling the cause of a devastating neurological disease
研究揭示了 Blautia 细菌在肠道健康和疾病预防中的关键作用低纤维的“西方饮食”会对肠道中的保护性粘液屏障造成损害，而这种损害会增加炎症和感染的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Research-uncovers-Blautia-bacterias-crucial-role-in-gut-health-and-disease-protection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Research-uncovers-Blautia-bacterias-crucial-role-in-gut-health-and-disease-protection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71e5c3f1-7adb-4862-967f-2eda8471ae82 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 07:29:14 -0400 Research uncovers Blautia bacteria's crucial role in gut health and disease protection
在美国基地接触橙剂的退伍军人面临癌症，却得不到退伍军人管理局的补偿作为加利福尼亚州蒙特雷县奥德堡的一名年轻士兵，迪恩·奥斯本大部分时间都在海边林地中度过，在土壤上进行训练，并大量饮用溪流和含水层中的水，这些水现在已知受到了致癌污染物的污染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Expose-to-agent-orange-at-US-bases-veterans-face-cancer-without-VA-compensation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Expose-to-agent-orange-at-US-bases-veterans-face-cancer-without-VA-compensation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=361265f7-4443-426a-a52a-44fcaa05a290 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 07:03:18 -0400 Exposed to agent orange at US bases, veterans face cancer without VA compensation
佛罗里达州新的 6 周堕胎禁令对南方和旅行患者意味着什么莫妮卡·凯利得知自己即将迎来自己的第二个孩子，非常兴奋。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/What-Floridae28099s-new-6-week-abortion-ban-means-for-the-South-and-traveling-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/What-Floridae28099s-new-6-week-abortion-ban-means-for-the-South-and-traveling-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f2e1e38-84e0-4bce-93de-a675ddbbc3d9 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 06:57:13 -0400 What Florida’s new 6-week abortion ban means for the South, and traveling patients
大多数人工智能临床试验报告了积极的结果，但对普遍性的担忧仍然存在临床实践中人工智能 (AI) 算法的随机对照试验 (RCT) 状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Majority-of-AI-clinical-trials-report-positive-outcomes-yet-concerns-over-generalizability-persist.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Majority-of-AI-clinical-trials-report-positive-outcomes-yet-concerns-over-generalizability-persist.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bfa7997-0a78-4221-9f47-9d4e21ee60b7 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 06:29:00 -0400 Majority of AI clinical trials report positive outcomes, yet concerns over generalizability persist
SARS-CoV-2 感染是否会导致嗅觉和味觉长期丧失？使用经过验证的心理物理学测试得出 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 与嗅觉和味觉相关的长期结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Do-SARS-CoV-2-infections-cause-long-term-loss-of-smell-and-taste.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Do-SARS-CoV-2-infections-cause-long-term-loss-of-smell-and-taste.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52848656-8454-4404-b072-7cfa7d1dfc38 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 06:02:00 -0400 Do SARS-CoV-2 infections cause long-term loss of smell and taste?
古老谷物有望治疗 2 型糖尿病《营养、代谢和心血管疾病》杂志上的一项荟萃​​分析发现，燕麦、糙米和小米等古老谷物可能会改善 2 型糖尿病患者的血脂状况，但研究设计的变化需要进一步的研究来证实这些益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Ancient-grains-show-promise-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Ancient-grains-show-promise-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=806660f2-91f8-43d9-be41-5d87c0dfaf73 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 00:00:00 -0400 Ancient grains show promise for type 2 diabetes
